hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that the wife of Thabit bin Qais came to the Prophet and said:"O Messenger of Allah, I do not find any fault with Thabit bin Qais regarding his attitude or religious commitment, but I hate Kufr after becoming Muslim." The Messenger of Allah said: "Will you give him back his garden?" She said: "Yes." The Messenger of Allah said: "Take back the garden and divorce her once
